```{r, message = FALSE}
here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(vroom)
```

### Q1.Data loading : 

```{r, message = FALSE}

grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```

### Q.2. 

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
summarize <- grades |> 
  summarise(min(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), max(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), median(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), mean(Exam, na.rm=TRUE))

summarize |>
  knitr::kable()
  
```

### Q.3 : 

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
exam_na <-  grades |>
  filter(is.na(Exam)) |>
  count(is.na(Exam))
```

There are `r exam_na` students who didn't take the Exam.
